ygData.subject: RE: Dex vrs Agility
ygData.msgSnippet: agility is getting hit less by mobs. dexterity is you hitting mobs more often. i guess it depends on how you play your bard.  fighter-bard would want more dex,
ygData.messageBody:
agility is getting hit less by mobs.
dexterity is you hitting mobs more often.

i guess it depends on how you play your bard. fighter-bard would want more
dex, bard-fighter may want more agility since they attract a lot of
attention.

and then there is nothing wrong with getting both dex and agi. i.e. golden
black pearl choker 7agi/7dex, best of both worlds =)

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 22 High Elf Paladin
Tyria, Level 12 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server


> What is better (for a bard, don't wanna get kaboonged...) Dex or
> Agility? The manuals are rather vague on this. Anyone done any
> testing? Empirical evidence? I have been mostly
> collecting Agility
> items based on messages I read in the past. I
> personally have not
> noticed much effect with dex items even though I have a
> couple. I've
> spent a lot of money (bard money) on agility items and I hope I
> haven't wasted it.
>
> Bujold
> 20th song (finally)
